mapper.insert: insert into client (client_num, client_name, car_type, car_id, tel, client_id, password) values (#{client_num}, #{client_name}, #{car_type}, #{car_id}, #{tel}, #{client_id}, #{password})
mapper.select: select * from client order by client_num desc
mapper.update: update client set tel=#{tel} where client_id =#{client_id}
